Leland follows the story of Leland P. Fitzgerald (Ryan Gosling), a disaffected teenager who has apparently murdered a severely retarded peer, the brother of his would-be lover Allison (Jena Malone). I loved October Sky. The thing I loved most had to be the music. It worked two ways: in the first hour of the film, it gives off a sense of hunger competition between the tribes, and then the last track gives off a sense of victory. Yes, I did realise this was not an original idea like when Colum McCann did it for Let The Great World Spin , but Sky & I truly knocked it out of the park.

Spirit and Chaos is an artistic biopic of Miyazawa Kenji, a Japanese poet and writer who was active in the early 20th century. Centered on Miyazawa’s own life, the film depicts his adolescence in the country, the ideals he holds and the books he reads, and the battles he must overcome in order to become an artist. This movie is nothing short of a dark, gritty masterpiece. I may be bias, as the Apartheid era is an area I've always felt for South Africa.
